TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GridItemPattern/GridItemPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.
Docs.value: 以零為起始的序號，識別資料行，內含格或項目。 預設值為 0。

remarks.format:
## Examples 在下列範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent>接聽程式會宣告為追蹤方格項目位於方格容器內的往返。 項目屬性會在每個焦點變更事件時，主控台回應。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnSpan As Integer
public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.
Docs.value: 合併的資料行數目。 預設值為 1。

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingGrid As AutomationElement

Docs.summary: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports and represents the container of the cell or item.
Docs.value: A [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 項目支援 GridPattern 並代表資料表資料格或項目容器。 預設值是 null 參考 (在 Microsoft Visual Basic.NET)。

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Row As Integer
public: property int Row { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.
Docs.value: 以零為起始的序號，識別資料列包含資料表儲存格或項目。 預設值為 0。

remarks.format:
